rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious and inviting entrance with Kerala-style architectural elements such as wooden carvings, traditional stone thresholds. This area is designed to be wheelchair accessible with ramps and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large open area adjacent to the lobby featuring traditional Kerala woodwork and tiled flooring. The layout includes multiple seating areas with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A formal dining space that can also serve as a family gathering area. The room is designed with Kerala-style wooden beams and motifs.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A fully equipped modern kitchen integrated within a traditional Kerala design. Features include ergonomic workspaces, adequate storage and wheelchair-accessible counters.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room featuring traditional Kerala aesthetics with modern amenities. The design ensures comfort and privacy with a dedicated balcony.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The largest bedroom on the ground floor, integrating Kerala architectural elements such as carved wood panels and stone accents. Includes an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A quiet study area for work or leisure with traditional design elements and modern amenities. The room is designed to be ergonomic and wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated fitness area with state-of-the-art equipment, designed in a Kerala architectural style with natural lighting and ventilation. The space is also wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A service area for laundry, storage and other utilities. It is designed with easy access and minimalistic Kerala style.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A traditional wooden door with ornamental details. The entrance is designed to be wheelchair accessible with ramps and wide thresholds.

openings.name: Front Verandah
openings.description: A covered outdoor space that complements the entrance. Includes traditional Kerala stone work and tiled flooring.

openings.name: Backdoor Exit
openings.description: A secondary exit leading to a private garden area. Designed with ease of access and safety in mind.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Large casement windows featuring traditional Kerala designs, ensuring ample natural light while maintaining privacy and energy efficiency.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom on the upper floor, designed with Kerala style and sufficient natural light. It includes a small balcony for ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom with modern fixtures integrated into the Kerala design. It is accessible and includes safety features.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom for guests, designed with traditional Kerala motifs and modern plumbing standards.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A wide staircase with handrails and non-slip surfaces connecting the two levels. Designed for safety and wheelchair accessibility.

vastu_compliance.note: The floor plan has been designed with Vastu principles in mind. The main entrance faces a favorable direction ensuring positive energy flow, and the layout of rooms respects traditional Kerala design elements while maintaining modern accessibility standards.

building_norms.note: The design adheres to local building norms with proper setbacks, structural safety measures, and wheelchair accessibility as per luxury residential standards.
